channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MS
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MS

item.title: Report X-2023110910
item.description:
Report X-2023110910

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-30T18:13:44+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: OLIVE BRANCH
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pail was being unloaded and fell onto the ground. Pail was immediately put into a container to prevent further spillage. DescribePack: Lid was not completely closed. Small crack on top of lid caused leakage. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pail was put into an inner container to prevent further damage to other packages.

item.title: Report E-2023110094
item.description:
Report E-2023110094

Identified by scraper @ 2023-11-28T18:13:22+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-10-23
  • City: RICHLAND
  • State: MS
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO LOGISTICS FREIGHT, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: Approximately 10 gallons of battery acid were released from car batteries due to a forklift puncture. The release impacted the inside of trailer and the concrete under the trailer. A contractor was called to assist in the cleanup of material.
